attributes.action: resign once this petition has received 1,000,000 British signatures
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
If you do not want, or you did not even approve of, Gordon Brown being our Prime Minister, then sign this peition and please send it to all you know.

I just thought I'd revive an age-old practice in this country, known as 'democracy'.

Mr Brown, if you love your country more than yourself, you will carry this out.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
